thread.title: BRIEF-Visteon Corp Says ‍Unveiling DriveCore Autonomous Driving Platform At CES 2018​

title: BRIEF-Visteon Corp Says ‍Unveiling DriveCore Autonomous Driving Platform At CES 2018​

organizations.name: brief-visteon corp says ‍unveiling drivecore autonomous driving platform
brief-visteon corp says ‍unveiling drivecore autonomous driving plat

text:
11 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Visteon Corp Says ‍Unveiling DriveCore Autonomous Driving Platform At CES 2018​ Reuters Staff 
Jan 9 (Reuters) - Visteon Corp: 
* VISTEON CORP - ‍UNVEILING DRIVECORE AUTONOMOUS DRIVING PLATFORM AT CES 2018​ 
* VISTEON INTRODUCES DRIVECORE™ AUTONOMOUS DRIVING PLATFORM TO ACCELERATE ADOPTION OF SELF-DRIVING TECHNOLOGY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
